transcript.prompt: Answer YES or NO: is the liver part of the excretory system

transcript.reply: YES. The liver is part of the excretory system. It plays a crucial role in detoxifying the blood, producing bile to aid in digestion, and excreting waste products such as bilirubin and excess substances into the bile, which is then eliminated from the body through the digestive tract.
